name: ListGithubCheckRunsForSuite
description:
List check runs for a GitHub check suite using its ID.

This tool retrieves a list of check runs for a specified check suite in a GitHub repository. It requires appropriate permissions or scopes depending on the repository type.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner's username of the repository. Case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to query. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: check_suite_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the check suite to list its check runs.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the check suite.

parameters.name: check_run_name
parameters.description: Returns check runs with the specified name.

value_schema.description: Returns check runs with the specified `name`.

parameters.name: check_run_status
parameters.description: Specify the status of the check runs to be returned. Options: 'queued', 'in_progress', 'completed'.

value_schema.description: Returns check runs with the specified `status`.

parameters.name: filter_by_completion_time
parameters.description: Filters check runs by their `completed_at` timestamp. Use 'latest' for the most recent runs or 'all' for all runs.

value_schema.description: Filters check runs by their `completed_at` timestamp. `latest` returns the most recent check runs.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Sets the number of results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Specifies which page of the results to fetch, for paginated data.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: check_name
parameters.description: Returns check runs with the specified `name`.

value_schema.description: Returns check runs with the specified `name`.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Returns check runs with the specified `status`.

value_schema.description: Returns check runs with the specified `status`.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters check runs by their `completed_at` timestamp. `latest` returns the most recent check runs.

value_schema.description: Filters check runs by their `completed_at` timestamp. `latest` returns the most recent check runs.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: check_suite_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the check suite.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the check suite.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
